text: Sergiu Natra (12 April 1924 â€“ 23 February 2021) was an Israeli composer. (Print version: Sadie, Stanley (ed.), The New Grove Dictionary of Music and Musicians, Macmillan, 1980, Vol. 13 p. 76. ) He was known for his compositions for the harp, including "Music for Violin and Harp", "Sonatina for Harp", "Prayer for Harp", "Divertimento for Harp flute and Strings orchestra", "Music for Nicanor", "Commentaires Sentimentaux", "Ode To The Harp" and "Trio in One Movement no. 3". ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Israeli composers Category:20th-century composers
title: Sergiu Natra
